row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@WINDOWS
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
Set-Location &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR# !Build tags options - start <--- :SET &TAGS_OPTION# = "" :DEFINE &TAGS#, string, 10 :FILL &TAGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_AWS_TAGS#,",")
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&TAGS#[])
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# :SET &VAR# = FORMAT(&VAR#,"0") :IF &TAGS#[&VAR#] <> "" : PRINT "&VAR#. Partial string = &TAGS#[&VAR#]" : SET &TAGS_OPTION# = STR_CAT(&TAGS_OPTION#, '--tag "\""&TAGS#[&VAR#]\""" ') :ENDIF :SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 :ENDWHILE !Build tags options - end --->
Write-Host Set tags for instance..
$output = java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute $env:EC2_HOME\bin\ec2-create-tags.cmd &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# &UC4RB_AWS_INSTANCE_ID# &TAGS_OPTION#
$result = $output | select-string -pattern ^TAG -caseSensitive
if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host Failed to set tags for instance $error = [string]::join("`n", $output) Write-Host $error exit 1 }
$result = [string]::join("`n", $result) Write-Host $result Write-Host "`nSuccessfully set tags for instance"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
